items.name: Magic Staff
items.description: A staff imbued with magical energy, useful for casting spells.

items.name: Steel Helmet
items.description: A sturdy steel helmet that offers protection for the head.

items.name: Mana Potion
items.description: A potion that restores 40 mana points when consumed.

items.name: Leather Boots
items.description: Lightweight boots that provide basic protection and agility.

items.name: Enchanted Ring
items.description: A magical ring that boosts the wearer's magical abilities.

items.name: Crossbow
items.description: A ranged weapon that fires bolts with great precision.

items.name: Chainmail Vest
items.description: A vest made of interlocking metal rings, offering moderate protection.

items.name: Antidote
items.description: A potion that neutralizes poison effects when consumed.

items.name: Bow and Arrows
items.description: A bow with a quiver of arrows, effective for ranged attacks.

items.name: Cloak of Invisibility
items.description: A magical cloak that makes the wearer invisible for a short time.

items.name: Dagger
items.description: A small, easily concealed weapon ideal for stealth attacks.

items.name: Tower Shield
items.description: A large shield that provides substantial protection but is heavy to carry.

items.name: Elixir of Strength
items.description: A potion that temporarily boosts the drinker's strength.

items.name: Mithril Boots
items.description: Lightweight boots made from mithril, offering excellent protection and agility.

items.name: Fireball Scroll
items.description: A scroll that allows the user to cast a powerful Fireball spell.

items.name: Studded Leather Armor
items.description: Leather armor reinforced with metal studs for added protection.

items.name: Healing Bandage
items.description: A bandage that restores 25 health points when used.

items.name: Thunder Hammer
items.description: A mighty hammer that causes thunderous shockwaves on impact.

items.name: Giant's Gauntlets
items.description: Heavy gauntlets that increase the wearer's strength and defense.

items.name: Potion of Agility
items.description: A potion that temporarily enhances the user's agility.

items.name: Golden Crown
items.description: A luxurious crown that boosts the wearer's charisma.

items.name: Frost Blade
items.description: A sword imbued with frost magic, causing freezing damage.
